patterns::​enum_iterator
sp_base_object
patterns::​ .​iterator​#(T)
patterns::​ .​enum_iterator​#(type T=dummy_enum)

An iterator implementation for iterating over enums.

Constructors
from
static function iterator from(
T 
_start
 = 
_.first()
)

Returns a new enum_iterator instance starting at the first enumeration value by default.

If ~start~ is specified, the returned instance will be initialized to start at the specified ~start~ value.

Iterator Interface
item
virtual function T item()

Returns the iterator's current enumeration value.

first
virtual function T first()

Returns the first field of the enumeration.

last
virtual function T last()

Returns the last field of the enumeration.

start
virtual function T start()

Returns the starting value of this iterator instance.

prev
virtual function iterator prev()

Progresses the iterator instance to the previous enumeration value and returns it.

next
virtual function iterator next()

Progresses the iterator instance to the next enumeration value and returns it.

has_next
virtual function bit has_next()

Returns 1 if the iterator's item is pointing at the last enumeration field, or 0 otherwise.

has_prev
virtual function bit has_prev()

Returns 1 if the iterator's item is pointing at the first enumeration field, or 0 otherwise.
